title: URL Shortener (TinyURL/Bitly)
description:
Design a URL shortener that converts long URLs into short tokens and redirects users to the original URL. Focus on high availability, low latency redirects, and simple analytics.

Functional requirements:
- POST an original URL → get a short URL
- Redirect short URL → 302/301 to original
- Optional: custom alias, expiry, basic click analytics

Non-functional:
- p95 redirect latency < 50ms from edge
- Availability 99.99%
- Global traffic; reads » writes (≈ 100:1)

Data constraints:
- ~200M active links, ~2B clicks/day at scale
- Token length 6–8 (62-char alphabet)
